title: Love to the Third Degree
description: Fifteen single women vie for the heart of one man whose face will be concealed the entire time. Will they stand by their belief that beauty is on the inside, or will his physical appearance be too much to handle?
creator: Dougie Schecter
altHero: man in a flannel shirt and jacket with a gold face mask on
alt2: gold face mask guy having a patio lunch with a woman
alt3: gold face mask walking arm and arm with a different woman
